verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Praise Him, praise Him,
Praise Him in the morning,
Praise Him in the noon-time,
Praise Him, praise Him,
Praise Him when the
sun goes down.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Love Him, love Him,
Love Him in the morning,
Love Him in the noon-time.
Love Him, love Him,
Love Him when the
sun goes down.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Serve Him, serve Him,
Serve Him in the morning,
Serve Him in the noon-time.
Serve Him, serve Him,
Serve Him when the
sun goes down

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Thank Him, thank Him,
Thank Him in the morning,
Thank Him in the noon-time.
Thank Him, thank Him,
Thank Him when the
sun goes down.
